Title: Lifesize
Plot: Bette gives Tina her consent -- and a possible ultimatum -- to explore her feelings for men. Jenny meets with a publisher about her manuscript for a book, Billie makes Moira a tempting, but shady offer, Kit gives in to Angus' advances, and Carmen lays down the law to Shane regarding their relationship. Alice offers her support to Lara and celebrations are cut short when the girls finally find out the truth about Dana's condition.
GuestStars: P. Lynn Johnson,  Brendan Penny,  Barbara Kottmeier,  Michael Hogan,  Andrew Airlie,  Ellie Harvie,  Callum Keith Rennie,  Corin Tucker,  Carrie Brownstein,  Janet Weiss,  Geoff Gustafson,  Pamela Diaz,  Suzanne
